name: Ricardo Cordero
bio: Ricardo Cordero, the dynamic Right Back for Tierra Alta FC, showcases explosive pace and relentless energy on the field. Hailing from the lush terrains of Costa Rica, he combines an aggressive defensive style with precise crossing ability, making him a dual threat. Known for his determination and tactical awareness, Cordero's tenacity and vibrant presence inspire his teammates, helping them thrive in both domestic and international competitions.
